title: The Lake at the Inn
description:
Our story tonight is called the Lake at the Inn and it’s a story about a misty summer morning on the water. It’s also about a mug of coffee poured by a friend, the sounds you hear when you truly stop to listen and a row boat just waiting to be pushed out away from shore.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Buy the book:http://hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

Get an autographed copy and other merch here: https://www.nothingmuchhappens.com/nmh-stuff

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
